page.title: 12A Day in the Life of Neil
page.content:
I wake up at 7 o'clock, get dressed and go downstairs. I read a comic while I wait for my breakfast of porridge, after which I listen to some Breakdance music. Next, I collect my bag and go down to the bus stop to wait for the school bus. When I get to school I wait in the playground for about 5 minutes. We go inside at 8.55 and line up for Assembly. After Assembly we have lessons. My favourite lessons are English, Art and Curve Stitching. After school I play with my friends at the park. I often go fishing.I go in for my tea at about 8.30.I go to bed at 9.30 or 10.00. That is how I spend a normal school day.
Neil Henson
